SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.am24.model

Class Game

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.am24.model.Game
public class Game extends Object
The Game class represents the overall game state, including decks of cards, face-up cards on the table, common goals, available colors, and drawn goal cards.

  • Constructor Details

    • Game

      public Game()
      Constructs a new game instance. Initializes the face-up cards, common goals, available colors, and drawn goal cards.

  • Method Details

    • start

      public void start()
      Starts the game by creating and shuffling the decks, setting up the table with initial cards, and drawing the initial common goals.
